pullrequest.title: New parsing framework, drop the 2, parity basis

content.raw:
I've tested this PR against Taylor-Couette growth rates, finding identical accuracy to the previous version. Also, I've confirmed that both my TC notebook and Daniel's KH notebook work properly. As soon as this PR is accepted, I'll post one including these notebooks.

I have one minor suggestion: perhaps the default log level could be set from DEBUG back to INFO. As of now, Dedalus produces a LOT of output, much of which is not always useful in everyday use.  Regardless, I'm approving the PR now. Great work, Keaton!
content.html:
I've tested this PR against Taylor-Couette growth rates, finding identical accuracy to the previous version. Also, I've confirmed that both my TC notebook and Daniel's KH notebook work properly. As soon as this PR is accepted, I'll post one including these notebooks.

I have one minor suggestion: perhaps the default log level could be set from DEBUG back to INFO. As of now, Dedalus produces a LOT of output, much of which is not always useful in everyday use. Regardless, I'm approving the PR now. Great work, Keaton!
